QuestData.Title: Intervention
QuestData.Description: The flayers have gone crazy with hunger. Their digging was once tempered and moderate. Now their hunger cannot be quenched. They grow murderously violent.$B$BThe flayers have turned on my sons. They overwhelm them. Kill them. It must stop.$B$BKill the flayers. They serve no purpose to the earth. Their passing will not be missed. Save my sons. Slaughter any flayers you find.
QuestData.CompletionText: I do not know why the flayers hunger so. Many things have changed since the rift opened between our worlds.
